description:
In the bottom half of the seventh inning, the Washinomori players are confused. Kirino takes this opportunity to strike back and to take the lead.
Kirino puts up a fight and scores 9 points in one go. The game ends earlier. 
Although losing is inevitable, Kurokan tells the players to use their brains and think of the reasons of losing.
Kurokan decides to solove the problem of Sakamoto. He goes to the gas station where Sakamoto works. After he learns about his living conditions he wants to sign Sakamoto for a monthly salary of ï¿¥150,000.
Source: crunchyroll
